abstract: The strike follows the first set of labor negotiations between the United Steelworkers of America and Vale since it acquired Inco in 2007.
snippet: The strike follows the first set of labor negotiations between the United Steelworkers of America and Vale since it acquired Inco in 2007.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA  About 3,100 workers at Vale Inco’s nickel mining and refining operations in Sudbury, Canada, went on strike early Monday after overwhelmingly rejecting a final offer from the company.

headline.main: 3,100 on Strike at Vale Inco in Canada
